response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. Considering its exceptional attributes, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $15,000. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can assist you with.", "product_price": 15000}
